attributes.action: insist that Guildford Borough Council preserves the Aldershot Road Allotment Site (Westborough, Guildford) as Allotments and Open Space.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to insist that Guildford Borough Council preserves the Aldershot Road Allotment Site (Westborough, Guildford) as Allotments and Open Space.
 
We call for (1) the complete removal of the threat of Housing Development on this nature-rich Greenfield site and valuable community asset and (2) that the Council's Housing Programme be limited to development on the abundant Brownfield sites in the Borough.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "insist that Guildford Borough Council preserves the Aldershot Road Allotment Site (Westborough, Guildford) as Allotments and Open Space."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14470.asp

Prime Minister's Office
